abstract: stocks showing improved relative strength : vipshop .
article: the relative strength rating for vipshop moved into a higher percentile wednesday , as it got a lift from 69 to 74 . this unique rating identifies technical performance by using a 1 to 99 score that shows how a stock 's price action over the trailing 52 weeks compares to other publicly traded companies . decades of market research reveals that the market 's biggest winners tend to have an rs rating of at least 80 in the early stages of their moves . see if vipshop can continue to show renewed price strength and hit that benchmark .

looking for the best stocks to buy and watch ? start herevipshop is working on a cup without handle with a 15.59 entry . see if it can break out in heavy trade . vipshop showed -7 % eps growth in the latest quarterly report , while sales growth came in at 28 % . the company earns the no . 7 rank among its peers in the retail-internet industry group . alibaba , petmed express and etsy are among the top 5 highly rated stocks within the group . related : retail industry news and stocks to watchibd stock rating upgrades : rising relative strengthwhy should you use ibd 's relative strength rating ?
